9.4 DUIM-Frames Module

menu-item-value

Generic function

Summary

Returns the value of the specified menu item.

Signature

menu-item-value menu-item => value

Arguments

menu-item
An instance of type <command-table-menu-item>.

Values

value
An instance of type <object>.

Library

duim-frames

Module

duim-frames

Description

Returns the value of menu-item.

See also

menu-item-name, page 832

menu-item-options, page 833

menu-item-type, page 834

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
